snippet: All the public tickets to President Obama's official inaugural ball and parade were snapped up Sunday - a day before they were scheduled to go on sale - after Ticketmaster inadvertently sent out e-mails announcing they were available, inaugural...
abstract: All the public tickets to President Obama's official inaugural ball and parade were snapped up Sunday - a day before they were scheduled to go on sale - after Ticketmaster inadvertently sent out e-mails announcing they were available, inaugural officials said on Monday.

headline.main: After Ticketmaster Glitch, Inaugural Ball and Parade Tickets Sell Out Early
